description: Agent field mapping configuration - Unified naming
notes: 1. Single value → singular (org_id, supervisor_id, not org_ids, supervisors)
2. Multiple values → plural (personalities, skills, not personality_traits, skill_set)
Layer 1: Object = DTO (unified field names, no conversion)
Layer 2: DTO → Cloud (Schema): id → agid, JSON serialize, exclude fields
Layer 3: Cloud → GraphQL: Build mutation string
1. Field name mapping: id → agid (only different field)
- ext: Local-only field (not sent to cloud)
- skills, tasks, tools: Relationship fields (managed separately via AgentSkill, AgentTask, AgentTool)
